properties.NAME: The Swamp
properties.DESCRIPTION: Massive swamp filled with mysterious 'spirit energy'

properties.NAME: HeiBai's Forest
properties.DESCRIPTION: Home to the spirit, HaiBai. The forest was burned down by the Fire Nation during the 100 Year War

properties.NAME: Chin
properties.DESCRIPTION: Village that celebrates Avatar Day. They originally hated the Avatar because of a misunderstanding about Avatar Kyoshi and the death of Chin the Conqueror. After Avatar Aang saved the village from the Rough Rhinos, they loved the Avatar again and now celebrate them

properties.NAME: Gaoling
properties.DESCRIPTION: An old, well-established town home to some wealthy Earth Kingdom families. Site of the popular Earth Rumble 6. Where Avatar Aang first meets his earthbending teacher, Toph

properties.NAME: Misty Palms Oasis
properties.DESCRIPTION: An oasis at the edge of the desert

properties.NAME: Full Moon Bay
properties.DESCRIPTION: Ferry site for refugees trying to get to Ba Sing Se

properties.NAME: Serpent's Pass
properties.DESCRIPTION: Dangerous land bridge whose water is home to a giant sea serpent

properties.NAME: The Library
properties.DESCRIPTION: A giant library under the sands of the desert. Run by the spirit Wan Shi Tong

properties.NAME: Lake Laogai
properties.DESCRIPTION: Lake in Ba Sing Se with prisons and secret rooms for Earth Kingdom prisoners and brainwashings

properties.NAME: Tu Zin
properties.DESCRIPTION: An abandoned village site of a conflict between Avatar Aang and his friends, Prince Zuko, and Princess Azula

properties.NAME: Jet's Forest
properties.DESCRIPTION: Home to Jet and his gang after they lost their homes to the Fire Nation

properties.NAME: The Great Divide
properties.DESCRIPTION: Giant Canyon. The only way to cross is with a canyone guide that knows earthbending. DO NOT BRING FOOD INTO THE CANYON

properties.NAME: Lovers' Cave
properties.DESCRIPTION: Cave of Two Lovers infamous for travellers getting lost. If you can find your way through, you will arrive at Omashu

properties.NAME: Chameleon Bay
properties.DESCRIPTION: Where Avatar Aang and his friends meet up with Hakoda and the rest of the invasion group
